A bit About me

My full Name is Anne Manzi a lifelong learner.
I like to experience new things and taste different things the world offers.
I followed my passion, Website Design, and I am working to widen my knowledge in that field.
Hardworking and determination are my personal traits.
Have ideas that you want to share with the world online?
I can help you with that!
I am a Front-End Developer with motivation of supporting my community.
